subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Over 11 seasons, Mickey Morandini batted .268, but he hit a combined .352 off three pitchers likely to be named to the Hall of Fame on Tuesday: Randy Johnson, Pedro Martinez and John Smoltz.
snippet: Over 11 seasons, Mickey Morandini batted .268, but he hit a combined .352 off three pitchers likely to be named to the Hall of Fame on Tuesday: Randy Johnson, Pedro Martinez and John Smoltz.
